item.title: masterã¸ã®force pushã¨deleteã‚’é˜²ãpre-pushãƒ•ãƒƒã‚¯
item.description:
ã‚„ã‚‹ãªã€ã¨è¨€ã‚ã‚Œã‚Œã°ãã†ãªã‚“ã ã‘ã© ã†ã£ã‹ã‚Šmasterã« git push --force ã¨ã‹ã‚„ã‚Šãã†ã«ãªã‚‹ã¨èƒŒç­‹ãŒå‡ã‚‹ã€‚ ãƒªãƒ¢ãƒ¼ãƒˆãŒgithubã ã¨ãƒªãƒ¢ãƒ¼ãƒˆå´ã§æ‹’å¦ã¨ã‹ã§ããªã„ã®ã§ã€ã‚¯ãƒ©ã‚¤ã‚¢ãƒ³ãƒˆå´ã® pre-push ãƒ•ãƒƒã‚¯ã‚’ä½¿ã£ã¦ç¦æ­¢ã—ãŸã„ã€‚ èª¿ã¹ã¦ã¿ã‚‹ã¨ è‰¯ã„æ„Ÿã˜ ãªãƒ•ãƒƒã‚¯ãŒã‚ã£ãŸã®ã§å°‘ã—ã„ã˜ã£ã¦ä½¿ã†ã“ã¨ã«ã—ãŸã€‚

.git/hooks/pre-push

protected_branches=( production master )
for i in "${protected_branches[@]}"
do

    protected_branch=$i

    policy='[Policy] Never push, force push or delete the '$protected_branch' branch! (Prevented with pre-push hook.)'

    current_branch=$(git symbolic-ref HEAD | sed -e 's,.*/\(.*\),\1,')

    push_command=$(ps -ocommand= -p $PPID)

    is_destructive='\-\-force|\-\-delete|\-f'

    will_remove_protected_branch=':'$protected_branch

    do_exit(){
      echo $policy
      exit 1
    }

    if [[ $push_command =~ $is_destructive ]] && [ $current_branch = $protected_branch ]; then
      do_exit
    fi

    if [[ $push_command =~ $is_destructive ]] && [[ $push_command =~ $protected_branch ]]; then
      do_exit
    fi

    if [[ $push_command =~ $will_remove_protected_branch ]]; then
      do_exit
    fi
done

unset do_exit

exit 0

protected_branches ã«åˆ—æŒ™ã—ãŸãƒ–ãƒ©ãƒ³ãƒã«

  • git push --force
  • git push -f
  • git push --delete
  • git push :$branch

item.description:

ãŸã ã—ã€åå‰ä»˜ãã®ãƒ«ãƒ¼ãƒˆã¯å†…éƒ¨ã§ (?P<$1>.+?) ã«ãªã‚‹ã€‚åå‰ã‚’æŒ‡å®šã™ã‚‹ã¨æ­£è¦è¡¨ç¾ã®ãƒ«ãƒ¼ãƒ«ãŒæ±ºã‚æ‰“ã¡ã«ãªã£ã¦ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚ ãªã®ã§æ­£è¦è¡¨ç¾ã§æ›¸ã„ã¦ã¿ã‚‹ã€‚

ã‚’ä½¿ç”¨

from boto import sqs
# æ¥ç¶š
conn = sqs.connect_to_region('ap-northeast-q', aws_access_key_id='key', aws_secret_access_key='sec')
# ã‚­ãƒ¥ãƒ¼ã‚’å–å¾—

# ãƒ¡ãƒƒã‚»ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚’å–å¾—

len(messages) # > 1

message.get_body()
"""
ä¸­èº«ãŒã“ã‚“ãªæ„Ÿã˜ã§åŒ–ã‘ã‚‹

O*^6\x8bb~'\x1a\xb6*'1\xeb,j\x07\x88w\x7f.....

é€šå¸¸ã®æ–¹æ³•ã§é€ã£ãŸæ™‚ã¯å•é¡Œç„¡ã„ã®ã ã‘ã©SNSã‹ã‚‰é€ã‚‹ã¨åŒ–ã‘ã‚‹ã€‚ ã‚ã¨ã‚³ãƒ³ã‚½ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã ã¨æ™®é€šã«èª­ã‚ã‚‹ã€‚ ã©ã†ã‚„ã‚‰é€šå¸¸ã®æ–‡å­—åˆ—ãŒbase64ã§ãƒ‡ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã•ã‚Œã¦ã—ã¾ã£ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã£ã½ã„ã€‚

import base64
txt ="""
{
    "Type" : "Notification",
    "MessageId" : "00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000",
    "TopicArn" : "arn:aws:sns:ap-northeast-1:12345:name",
    "Subject" : "Notification name",
    "Message" : "",
    "Timestamp" : "2013-06-15T13:30:26.436Z",
    "SignatureVersion" : "1",
    "Signature" : "",
    "SigningCertURL" : "https://cert",
    "UnsubscribeURL" : "https://unsubscribe"
    }
"""

# ãƒ‡ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã™ã‚‹
base64.b64decode(txt)

"""
ãªã‚“ã‹ä¼¼ãŸæ„Ÿã˜!!

O*^6\x8bb~'\x1a\xb6*'1\xeb,j\x07\x88wM4\xd3M4\xd3M4\xd3M4\xd3M4\xd3M4\xd3M4\xd3M4\xd1:)\x89\xc0+\x9d\xaa\xe7k\x0b,\x9e\xc6\xa9\x9e\x8a\xed\x85\xe6\xac\xb7]v\xdf\x8egjg\x92\xb9\xb8\xder\xd3h\xb6'\xe2q\xabb\xa2y\xda\x99\xe3\x1e\xb2\xc6\xa0y8\xa6z\xcbZ\x9a\x9d\xb4\xd7}:\xd7\x94\xf5\xdf}6\xeb\x8d\xfae(\xa0\x9d\xabn\xad\xe5^\xae\xc8\xa8\x9fT\xa2\x82v\xad\xba\xb7\x92\x8a\t\xe2\x9e\x00\x9e\xae\xd5\x11.\x1bm\xa6\xcf\xffq\xea\xedR{.n\xc7+\x89\xb7\x94D\xb8m\xb6\x9b?\xfe\xe9\xec\xb9\xbb\x1c\xae&\xde
"""

"""
æ­£ã—ã„çµæœãŒå–å¾—ã§ããŸ

{

"""
